requirement_text: The navigation system shall calculate a route from a user-specified origin to a user-specified destination using the current road network data.
preconditions: Map data loaded; GPS available; App on main screen
test_steps: 1) Enter origin A and destination B. 2) Tap 'Start' or 'Go'.
expected_results: A route is calculated using current road network data; route displayed on map; guidance ready.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall calculate a route from a user-specified origin to a user-specified destination using the current road network data.
test_steps: 1) Enter destination first, then origin. 2) Request route calculation.
expected_results: System correctly interprets origin/destination and calculates a route without errors.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall calculate a route from a user-specified origin to a user-specified destination using the current road network data.
test_steps: 1) Input origin coordinates and destination coordinates. 2) Request route.
expected_results: System calculates a valid route between coordinate points using road network.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall provide at least one alternative route when more than one feasible route exists.
test_case_title: Alternative route offered in dense area
preconditions: Map data loaded; Area with multiple feasible routes
test_steps: 1) Set origin/destination with multiple known route options. 2) Calculate route.
expected_results: System displays primary route and at least one alternative route option.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall provide at least one alternative route when more than one feasible route exists.
test_steps: 1) Select an alternative route from the list. 2) Start navigation.
expected_results: Guidance follows the selected alternative route; map and maneuvers match selection.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall provide at least one alternative route when more than one feasible route exists.
test_case_title: No alternatives when only one feasible route
preconditions: Map data loaded; Remote area with only one feasible path
test_steps: 1) Calculate route where only one feasible route exists.
expected_results: System does not invent alternatives; primary route only; no misleading options.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall provide turn-by-turn guidance to the driver throughout the active route.
test_steps: 1) Start route guidance. 2) Drive through at least 3 maneuvers.
expected_results: System provides turn-by-turn instructions for each maneuver until arrival.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall provide turn-by-turn guidance to the driver throughout the active route.
test_steps: 1) Drive toward next maneuver. 2) Observe instruction panel.
expected_results: Instruction includes next action and distance/time to the maneuver.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall provide turn-by-turn guidance to the driver throughout the active route.
test_steps: 1) Start guidance. 2) Switch to another screen/app briefly. 3) Return to navigation.
expected_results: Guidance remains active and continues providing correct next maneuver.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall continuously determine the vehicle’s current position while navigation is active.
test_steps: 1) Start navigation. 2) Drive continuously for 2 minutes.
expected_results: Vehicle position continues updating; location marker follows road progression.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall continuously determine the vehicle’s current position while navigation is active.
test_case_title: Position continuity through short GPS fluctuation
preconditions: Navigation active; Simulate brief GPS noise
test_steps: 1) Start navigation. 2) Introduce short signal fluctuation (<10s).
expected_results: System continues position determination without freezing; may smooth but remains plausible.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall continuously determine the vehicle’s current position while navigation is active.
preconditions: Navigation active; Route includes tunnel/covered area
test_steps: 1) Start navigation. 2) Enter tunnel. 3) Exit tunnel.
expected_results: System reacquires and corrects position shortly after exit; guidance continues.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall automatically recalculate the route when the vehicle deviates from the planned route.
test_steps: 1) Start route. 2) Intentionally take a wrong turn/off-route road.
expected_results: System detects deviation and automatically triggers rerouting to destination.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall automatically recalculate the route when the vehicle deviates from the planned route.
test_case_title: Reroute preserves destination and continues guidance
test_steps: 1) Deviate from route. 2) Observe new route generation.
expected_results: New route still targets original destination; turn-by-turn guidance updates accordingly.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall automatically recalculate the route when the vehicle deviates from the planned route.
test_steps: 1) Drive normally on planned route. 2) Observe rerouting behavior.
expected_results: System does not reroute unnecessarily; planned route remains active.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall consider real-time traffic information when calculating or recalculating routes, if such data is available.
test_case_title: Traffic used when available for initial route
test_steps: 1) Enable traffic layer. 2) Calculate route during known congestion.
expected_results: Route considers traffic (e.g., suggests faster option); ETA reflects traffic conditions.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall consider real-time traffic information when calculating or recalculating routes, if such data is available.
test_steps: 1) Deviate from route. 2) Observe rerouted path/ETA.
expected_results: Reroute uses traffic data; updated route/ETA reflect real-time conditions.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall consider real-time traffic information when calculating or recalculating routes, if such data is available.
test_steps: 1) Disable traffic or disconnect network. 2) Calculate route.
expected_results: Route still calculates; system indicates traffic not available or omits traffic-based adjustments.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow the user to search for destinations by address, point of interest, or geographic coordinates.
test_steps: 1) Enter a valid street address. 2) Execute search. 3) Select result.
expected_results: Destination result found; can be set as destination; route can be calculated.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow the user to search for destinations by address, point of interest, or geographic coordinates.
test_steps: 1) Search for a POI (e.g., 'gas station' or a known place name). 2) Select a result.
expected_results: POI results shown; selected POI can be used as destination.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow the user to search for destinations by address, point of interest, or geographic coordinates.
test_steps: 1) Enter coordinates in supported format (lat/long). 2) Search and select.
expected_results: System resolves coordinates to a map location and allows navigation to it.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow the user to configure route preferences, including avoidance of toll roads and highways.
test_case_title: Avoid toll roads preference affects route
preconditions: Preferences available; Area with toll option
test_steps: 1) Enable 'Avoid tolls'. 2) Calculate route across toll region.
expected_results: Route avoids toll roads when feasible; toll segments are excluded.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow the user to configure route preferences, including avoidance of toll roads and highways.
preconditions: Preferences available; Area with highway option
test_steps: 1) Enable 'Avoid highways'. 2) Calculate route that usually uses highway.
expected_results: Route reduces/avoids highways when feasible; guidance matches preference.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow the user to configure route preferences, including avoidance of toll roads and highways.
test_steps: 1) Start route. 2) Toggle 'Avoid tolls' mid-navigation. 3) Recalculate route.
expected_results: System recalculates using updated preferences (manual or automatic trigger) without crash.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall notify the user when the destination has been reached.
test_steps: 1) Navigate to destination. 2) Arrive within defined arrival radius.
expected_results: System shows arrival message and/or plays audio cue indicating destination reached.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall notify the user when the destination has been reached.
test_steps: 1) Arrive at destination. 2) Drive slightly past and stop again near destination.
expected_results: Arrival notification does not spam repeatedly; behavior consistent with design (e.g., once per trip).

requirement_text: The navigation system shall notify the user when the destination has been reached.
test_steps: 1) Navigate to a named POI. 2) Arrive.
expected_results: Notification references destination (name/address) clearly.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall display the current route and vehicle position on a map during navigation.
test_case_title: Map shows route line and position marker
test_steps: 1) Start navigation. 2) Observe map display.
expected_results: Map shows route polyline and current vehicle position marker.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall display the current route and vehicle position on a map during navigation.
test_steps: 1) Drive through multiple maneuvers. 2) Observe map persistence.
expected_results: Map continues to display route and position throughout navigation.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall display the current route and vehicle position on a map during navigation.
test_steps: 1) Start navigation. 2) Observe map as speed changes and turns occur.
expected_results: Map updates to maintain usable view (e.g., follows position); route and marker remain visible.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall present navigation instructions in a manner that minimizes driver distraction during vehicle operation.
test_steps: 1) Drive with active guidance. 2) Observe instruction UI.
expected_results: UI prioritizes essential maneuvers; avoids excessive text/animations/pop-ups that distract.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall present navigation instructions in a manner that minimizes driver distraction during vehicle operation.
test_steps: 1) Approach a turn. 2) Trigger non-critical notification (e.g., tips/ads/POI suggestions).
expected_results: Non-critical content is suppressed/delayed/minimized so maneuver instruction remains dominant.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall present navigation instructions in a manner that minimizes driver distraction during vehicle operation.
preconditions: Vehicle in motion; Day/night modes available
test_steps: 1) Drive in day mode and night mode. 2) Observe legibility and contrast.
expected_results: Instructions are readable quickly (clear fonts/icons/contrast) in both modes.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall provide spoken navigation instructions while the vehicle is in motion.
preconditions: Vehicle in motion; Volume audible; Navigation active
test_steps: 1) Start navigation. 2) Approach maneuver while driving.
expected_results: System plays spoken instruction for upcoming maneuver.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall provide spoken navigation instructions while the vehicle is in motion.
test_steps: 1) Observe next maneuver text/icon. 2) Listen to voice prompt.
expected_results: Spoken instruction content matches the displayed maneuver and timing.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall provide spoken navigation instructions while the vehicle is in motion.
test_steps: 1) Deviate from route. 2) Allow reroute. 3) Continue driving.
expected_results: Spoken instructions continue correctly on the new route.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow common navigation tasks to be completed with no more than three user interactions per task while driving.
test_steps: 1) From main map, set a recent destination and start guidance, counting interactions.
expected_results: Task completes in ≤3 interactions (e.g., tap recent, tap start, confirm).

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow common navigation tasks to be completed with no more than three user interactions per task while driving.
test_steps: 1) Cancel active route, counting interactions.
expected_results: Route canceled in ≤3 interactions; system returns to non-guidance state.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow common navigation tasks to be completed with no more than three user interactions per task while driving.
test_case_title: Find nearby POI and navigate within 3 interactions
test_steps: 1) Choose nearby POI category and start navigation, counting interactions.
expected_results: Common flow completes in ≤3 interactions (or system offers simplified driving UI).

requirement_text: The navigation system shall calculate an initial route within 5 seconds under normal operating conditions.
preconditions: Normal operating conditions; Traffic optional; Map data loaded
test_steps: 1) Start route calculation between two valid points. 2) Measure time to route ready.
expected_results: Route calculation completes within 5.0 seconds.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall calculate an initial route within 5 seconds under normal operating conditions.
test_steps: 1) Run 20 route calculations across varied distances. 2) Record durations.
expected_results: All (or defined percentile threshold per test plan) complete within 5 seconds.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall calculate an initial route within 5 seconds under normal operating conditions.
test_case_title: Initial route time with preferences enabled
preconditions: Normal operating conditions; Avoid tolls/highways enabled
test_steps: 1) Enable route preferences. 2) Calculate route. 3) Measure duration.
expected_results: Route calculation completes within 5 seconds even with preferences enabled.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall recalculate a route within 3 seconds after detecting a route deviation.
test_case_title: Reroute completes within 3 seconds after deviation
test_steps: 1) Deviate from route. 2) Measure from deviation detection to new route ready.
expected_results: Recalculated route is ready within 3.0 seconds after deviation detection.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall recalculate a route within 3 seconds after detecting a route deviation.
test_steps: 1) Perform 10 deviations at different speeds. 2) Record reroute times.
expected_results: Each reroute completes within 3 seconds (or within defined acceptance threshold).

requirement_text: The navigation system shall recalculate a route within 3 seconds after detecting a route deviation.
test_steps: 1) Enable traffic. 2) Deviate and measure reroute duration.
expected_results: Reroute completes within 3 seconds with traffic consideration active.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall update the displayed vehicle position at least once per second while navigation is active.
test_steps: 1) Drive for 60 seconds. 2) Count UI position updates or logged updates.
expected_results: Displayed position updates ≥60 times in 60 seconds (≥1 update/sec).

requirement_text: The navigation system shall update the displayed vehicle position at least once per second while navigation is active.
test_steps: 1) Drive through frequent turns for 60 seconds. 2) Observe update cadence.
expected_results: Update rate stays at least once per second; no prolonged freezes.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall update the displayed vehicle position at least once per second while navigation is active.
test_case_title: Update rate maintained under typical CPU load
test_steps: 1) Start navigation. 2) Introduce typical system load. 3) Measure update rate.
expected_results: Position updates remain ≥1Hz under normal operating conditions.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall be available for use at least 99.5% of the time during vehicle operation.
preconditions: Vehicle operation hours defined; Logging available
test_steps: 1) Operate system over defined period (e.g., fleet test). 2) Log uptime/downtime.
expected_results: Availability ≥99.5% during vehicle operation per measurement method.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall be available for use at least 99.5% of the time during vehicle operation.
preconditions: System running; Induce transient service restart
test_steps: 1) Trigger controlled restart/failure of nav service. 2) Observe recovery.
expected_results: System returns to usable state quickly; downtime contributes within 99.5% target.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall be available for use at least 99.5% of the time during vehicle operation.
test_case_title: No crash during extended navigation session
test_steps: 1) Run navigation continuously for long duration (e.g., 4 hours).
expected_results: No crashes; system remains usable; guidance continues.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall not provide navigation instructions that conflict with detected road restrictions (e.g., one-way streets).
preconditions: Map data includes one-way; Restrictions detectable
test_steps: 1) Plan route near one-way streets. 2) Start navigation.
expected_results: System does not instruct driving the wrong way on one-way roads.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall not provide navigation instructions that conflict with detected road restrictions (e.g., one-way streets).
test_case_title: No instruction to enter restricted road segment
test_steps: 1) Navigate near restricted segment. 2) Observe routing and instructions.
expected_results: System avoids restricted segment and does not instruct illegal entry when restriction detected.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall not provide navigation instructions that conflict with detected road restrictions (e.g., one-way streets).
test_steps: 1) Deviate toward restricted road. 2) Allow reroute.
expected_results: Rerouted guidance avoids conflicting instructions with detected restrictions.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall notify the user if accurate positioning cannot be determined for more than 10 seconds.
test_steps: 1) Start navigation. 2) Block GPS/positioning for 11+ seconds.
expected_results: System notifies user that accurate positioning is unavailable after 10 seconds threshold.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall notify the user if accurate positioning cannot be determined for more than 10 seconds.
test_case_title: No notify for short positioning loss
test_steps: 1) Block positioning for 5 seconds. 2) Restore signal.
expected_results: No loss-of-position notification is shown (or it clears quickly per design).

requirement_text: The navigation system shall notify the user if accurate positioning cannot be determined for more than 10 seconds.
test_steps: 1) Lose positioning for >10s. 2) Restore GPS. 3) Observe UI.
expected_results: Notification appears after threshold and clears/updates once accurate positioning returns.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall support updating map data without requiring replacement of the entire system software.
test_case_title: Map update installs without full software replacement
test_steps: 1) Initiate map update. 2) Complete installation. 3) Verify nav app version unchanged (unless designed).
expected_results: Map data updates successfully; core system software replacement not required.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall support updating map data without requiring replacement of the entire system software.
test_steps: 1) Calculate route before update. 2) Update maps. 3) Calculate route again.
expected_results: System functions normally after update; routes reflect updated map content.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall support updating map data without requiring replacement of the entire system software.
test_steps: 1) Start map update. 2) Interrupt power/network. 3) Restart system.
expected_results: System recovers safely; does not brick; user can retry update or rollback.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall store user preferences in a manner that persists across system restarts.
test_steps: 1) Set preferences (avoid tolls, units, voice). 2) Restart system. 3) Reopen nav.
expected_results: Preferences remain unchanged after restart.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall store user preferences in a manner that persists across system restarts.
test_case_title: Preferences apply to new route after restart
test_steps: 1) After restart, calculate a new route.
expected_results: New route reflects stored preferences (e.g., avoids tolls if enabled).

requirement_text: The navigation system shall store user preferences in a manner that persists across system restarts.
test_steps: 1) Turn vehicle/system off fully. 2) Turn on again. 3) Check preferences.
expected_results: Preferences persist across full power cycle.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall protect stored location and route history data from unauthorized access.
test_case_title: Route history not accessible without authorization
preconditions: Route history enabled and present; Unauthorized user context available
test_steps: 1) Attempt to access stored history via restricted UI/API without auth.
expected_results: Unauthorized access is blocked; data not disclosed.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall protect stored location and route history data from unauthorized access.
preconditions: Stored history present; Access to storage validation method available
test_steps: 1) Inspect stored files/logs via allowed test hooks. 2) Attempt to read raw sensitive content.
expected_results: Stored data is encrypted/obfuscated per design; sensitive data not readable in plaintext.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall protect stored location and route history data from unauthorized access.
test_steps: 1) Save route history. 2) Lock/logout profile. 3) Attempt to view history.
expected_results: History access requires authorization; locked state prevents viewing.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow the user to enable or disable storage of route history.
test_case_title: User can disable route history storage
test_steps: 1) Disable route history. 2) Navigate to a destination. 3) Check history list.
expected_results: No new route history is stored while disabled.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow the user to enable or disable storage of route history.
test_case_title: User can enable route history storage
test_steps: 1) Enable route history. 2) Navigate to a destination. 3) Check history list.
expected_results: Route is saved to history when enabled.

requirement_text: The navigation system shall allow the user to enable or disable storage of route history.
test_steps: 1) Disable history. 2) Start a route. 3) Re-enable history. 4) Start another route.
expected_results: Routes are saved only during enabled periods; behavior matches toggle state.
